(ROOT
  (SQ (MD Do) (RB n't)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VB feel)
      (ADVP (RB sometimes))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (NN life))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (NP
              (NP
                (QP (JJR more) (IN than)
                  (NP (RB just) (DT a) (NN series))))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (JJ random) (NNS events))
                  (VP (VBG happening)
                    (ADVP (RB just))
                    (PP (IN by)
                      (NP (JJ pure) (NN coincidence)))))))))))
    (. ?)))

advmod(common-16, also-15)
ccomp(eating-9, common-16)
prep(common-16, in-17)
nn(Kong-19, Hong-18)
pobj(in-17, Kong-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Paradise) (NNP Pavilion) (NNP Marina) (NNP Bay) (NNP Link))
    (VP (VBZ Mall))
    (, ,)))


nn(Link-5, Paradise-1)
nn(Link-5, Pavilion-2)
nn(Link-5, Marina-3)
nn(Link-5, Bay-4)
nsubj(Mall-6, Link-5)
root(ROOT-0, Mall-6)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (# #) (CD 02-01/02))
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Singapore))
      (NP
        (QP (CD 018984) (CD 65099308))))))


dep(02-01/02-2, #-1)
root(ROOT-0, 02-01/02-2)
dep(02-01/02-2, Singapore-3)
number(65099308-5, 018984-4)
dep(Singapore-3, 65099308-5)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (FRAG
      (NP (DT This) (NN review)))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (NN part))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT a) (NNS media)))))
    (NP (JJ tasting) (NN event) (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map))))


det(review-2, This-1)
dep(part-4, review-2)
cop(part-4, was-3)
root(ROOT-0, part-4)
prep(part-4, of-5)
det(media-7, a-6)
pobj(of-5, media-7)
amod(Map-12, tasting-8)
nn(Map-12, event-9)
nn(Map-12, View-10)
nn(Map-12, Larger-11)
nsubj(part-4, Map-12)
